main event: Sighting of unidentified metallic objects traveling at high speeds in Bellbrook, Ohio.
interesting points: The sighting lasted about 15 minutes from 1:45 to 2:00 PM,The objects were observed from both the ground and an aircraft,Their altitude was estimated between 5,000 and 10,000 feet,The objects were not detected on radar by Wright-Patterson AFB Control Tower,They exhibited gliding motion without discernible lights or markings.
witness description: Witnesses observed from the ground and an aircraft in the vicinity.
